title: perma banning roll out recently for alot of players?
body:
i had a recent topic about me being banned for a unknown reason which wasn't specified by riot...i made a ticket 12+hrs ago and based on my other thread: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/LWiEjZ3I-perma-banned-no-reason?sort_type=recent

that alot of other people who have never had even a chat restriction got the same ban i've linked a picture of the ban and the email response both very vague and no info given on the rule broken...and i'm seeing alot of people beginning to post about the same issue...so far no riot response...and no ticket response...so far atleast 20+ people i've seen saying they got the same ban + 3 of my friends locally even my roommate who only plays like once a month...may not be an alarming number right now...but who knows you may be next...

anyways any thought on whats going on?

"RISING BLADE Today at 15:02
Hi there,

The account was audited and issued a suspension resulting from negative experiences being caused to others. This kind of behavior includes purposeful griefing or trolling of others, hurting the game experience. This contributes towards a harmful environment for the community and is contrary towards positive sportsmanship.

We have to do our best to maintain a safe and fair atmosphere for players, and I regret to say that this account is not striving to perform as a stand up Summoner. Every Summoner should aspire to offer positive experiences for others to reinforce positive morale and good sportsmanship;

apparently i was SOOO much of a troll in the total of potentially 40 games i've played in ranked i got a perma ban from it...great experience i've had playing this game...i understand getting a toxic ban (i did have a 25 game chat restriction that i just finished the night i got banned) but i didnt get that..i got a griefing/trolling ban perma...which is just UNREALISTIC.

alot of people have spent money on this game and are hit with this ban...im not one of them thank god...but there needs to be proper justification ... someone just saying you broke X rule and bans you isn't right especially when money is involved for them...it's virtually a scandal...
